mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_sum(n):
    sum = 1
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        term = math.pow(2, i) / math.factorial(i)
        sum += term
    return sum

import math

def calculate_sum(n):
    sum = -1
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        term = math.pow(2, i) / math.factorial(i)
        sum += term
    return sum

def calculate_sum(n):
    sum = 0
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        term = math.pow(2, i) / math.factorial(i)
        sum -= term
    return sum
